WorkItem.Description:
Please set the required max 2 simultaneous connection limit (from your current 50) and use a non-faked distinct User-Agent when connecting to OpenStreetMap.org

OpenStreetMap has a tile usage policy: http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tile_usage_policy

We run a friendly tile usage policy by you are abusing the situation.
WorkItem.Summary: Set Connection Limit and use own User-Agent when connecting to OpenStreetMap

Comments.Message: you should be aware, that our local caching eliminate such problem
